name: Unreal VFX ShowCase
description:
Hello there! This is a short Unreal ShowCase I've made with my work during my internship... I did all the programming systems and design the whole level.

All the effects are made with Niagara except for those that were got in the free VFX pack!

At the level you will have;

-AOE spell (Done with the VFX pack) and they will be changed in the next patches;

-Single Target Spells;

-Spell effects;

All the textures are by Megascans Packs.

Special thanks to Andre Almeida that made the circles look better!
